alert.note: Alert for Barceloneta; Dorado; Manati; Vega Alta; Vega Baja (Puerto Rico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS San Juan (San Juan, Puerto Rico)
info.headline: Flood Advisory issued October 02 at 4:31PM ADT by NWS San Juan
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 530 PM AST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...A portion of Puerto Rico, including the following counties, Barceloneta, Dorado, Manati, Vega Alta and Vega Baja. * WHEN...Until 530 PM AST. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 331 PM AST, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. Minor flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly in the advisory area. Up to 1 inch of rain has fallen. - Additional rainfall amounts up to 1 inch are expected over the area. This additional rain will result in minor flooding. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Vega Baja, Manati, Vega Alta, Barceloneta, Dorado, Toa Baja, Toa Alta, Ceiba, Coto Norte, Miranda, Monserrate, La Luisa, Brenas, Imbery, Rio Lajas, San Antonio, Sabana, Tierras Nuevas Poniente, Tierras Nuevas Pon and Garrochales. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.

area.areaDesc: Barceloneta; Dorado; Manati; Vega Alta; Vega Baja
